display_name.description: A human-readable name or title to display

isboxerExperienceLevel.title: ISBoxer 1 Experience Level
isboxerExperienceLevel.description: ISBoxer 1 experience level, from 0 being new or none to 4 being expert

isboxer2ExperienceLevel.title: ISBoxer 2 Experience Level
isboxer2ExperienceLevel.description: ISBoxer 2 experience level, from 0 being new or none to 4 being expert

multiboxingExperienceLevel.title: Multiboxing Experience Level
multiboxingExperienceLevel.description: Multiboxing experience level, from 0 being new or none to 4 being expert

use64BitInnerSpace.title: Use 64-bit Inner Space
use64BitInnerSpace.description: Whether to use the 64-bit Inner Space executable. On a 32-bit Windows system, this should be false.

useVersionTrack.title: Version Track
useVersionTrack.description: The ISBoxer 2 Version Track to follow for updates, between Live and Test

notifyVersionDifference.title: Notify on Version Difference
notifyVersionDifference.description: The minimum version difference required before an update notification popup window is allowed

enableModuleDeveloperMode.title: Enable Module Developer Mode
enableModuleDeveloperMode.description: Enables additional controls to create and edit ISBoxer 2 Modules

uiZoomLevel.title: UI Zoom Multiplier
uiZoomLevel.description: ISBoxer 2 Launcher UI zoom multiplier; i.e. 100% is a 1.0 multiplier, and 0% is a 0.0 multiplier

autoLoadModules.title: Auto-load Modules
autoLoadModules.description: ISBoxer 2 will automatically load these Modules at startup

items.description: An ISBoxer 2 Module Name and Version to load

defaultToLastSelectedTeamAndMember.title: Default to last-selected Team and Member
defaultToLastSelectedTeamAndMember.description: If set to true, the last-selected Team and Team Member are kept in defaultTeam and defaultTeamMember and selected on the Launch tab

defaultTeam.title: Default Team
defaultTeam.description: If defaultToLastSelectedTeamAndMember is true, this Team is selected on the Launch tab

defaultTeamMember.title: Default Team Member
defaultTeamMember.description: If defaultToLastSelectedTeamAndMember is true, this Team Member is selected on the Launch tab
